name: Hardwood Spades
description:
Join the GREATEST SPADES COMMUNITY in the world to play with thousands of online players or just play spades Solo.

#1 Independent Game Festival for Best Visual Arts!

Hardwood Spades Free breathes new life into your favorite spades card game with excellent graphics and soothing environments. If you're new to Spades, don't worry you can find how to play tutorials. If you are familiar with Bridge, spades is much less complicated and easy to play but is similar. Hardwood Spades has the strategy aspects of a Texas Hold’em Poker game but with partners which really adds some new and fun gameplay. And it has luck elements of Slot games all with quality artwork and pleasant background sounds and background that take on a mini vacation.

***** "Great game I'm a big spades player an this game is awesome!" -Phenomenal W

Play online spades with players from across the internet or with family and friends. You can even post your winnings to Facebook for all your friends to see.

Spades game variations included in Hardwood Spades Free offline and Multiplayer live spades modes:
* Partnership Spades (traditional)
* Partnership - Suicide
* Partnership - Mirrors
* Individual Spades
* Individual -Mirror
* Individual-Cutthroat
* Individual -Cutthroat Mirror

Online Multiplayer Spades social games are free.

Also check out our other Hardwood online card and boardgames:
Hardwood Euchre - Jacks are Trump in this trick taking game.
Hardwood Hearts - A great trick taking game where the goal is to take the least amount of points.
Hardwood Backgammon - Who can move their men to safety 1st?
& Video Poker Duel - Play competitive video poker just like you'd find in a casino.

If you also like some solitude, all of our games can be played as single player. But for the ultimate single player experience, check out our game Hardwood Solitaire IV also available here on the AppStore
